[[File:Hyena_Clan_(Earth-616)_from_FF_Vol_1_19_0002.jpg|left|250px|thumb]]
===Origin===
The '''Hyena Clan''' are an ancient religious sect that separated from [[Wakanda]] centuries ago. They however retained advanced technology and used it to travel [[Africa]] taking what they want. They became known as scavengers and thieves, causing destruction wherever they went.{{r|FF #19}}

[[File:Hyena_Clan_(Earth-616)_from_FF_Vol_1_19_0003.jpg|left|250px|thumb]]
===Return to Wakanda===
The Hyena Clan returned to Wakanda to steal from the [[Wakandan Reservoir]]. When they teleported in the were met by the students of [[Future Foundation (Earth-616)|Future Foundation]] who were on vacation at the time. Aardwolf spotted [[Draconus (Earth-616)|Dragon Man]] hiding near by and opened fire. The young heroes banded together and were able to use the teleporter to send them direct to [[Birnin Zana (Earth)|Central Wakanda]] were they were met by the [[Shuri (Earth-616)|Black Panther]] and a large group of [[Dora Milaje (Earth-616)|Dora Milaje]].{{r|FF #19}}
